title: Can I gift a friend a skin of the champion that I own?
body:
I have draven, and he has draven. 

He wants soulreaver draven, but I do not have soulreaver draven.

In the end, can I gift him soulreaver draven?? 

{{champion:119}}

replies.body:
You can't gift skins that **you own**, but you can gift skins that are available on the store. Simply head to the store and hit the button for the *Gifting Center*. From here you can enter in the details for the recipient and gift you want to send.

If you have any questions along the way, let me know!
Does anyone know why cant you gift any skin avalible. I can only gift a few of them
